item.title: Self-Study in December 2022
item.description: CCache: a fast c/c++ compiler cache Related to 027d6f8a-714e-11ed-869a-0242ac110003 Tags: tool, cache, compilation-cache, optimization, speedup, c, cpp, c++, gcc, clang Id: f2423a38-714d-11ed-92b4-0242ac110003 Read: Thu, 01 Dec 2022 07:58:30 +0000 CATS: OpenAPI fuzzing and test generation tool Tags: cats, tool, openapi, fuzz-testing, test-tool, java, endava, eoin-woods Id: 08b0cdb0-714f-11ed-a45c-0242ac110003 Read: Thu, 01 Dec 2022 08:06:18 +0000 I’ve fuzzed a small part of the GitHub API. Here are my findings. Using CATS to fuzz part of the Github API.
